body:
Please english version
This is masterpiece and what your pixiv or twitter :)

There are really only oxen ready to do anything for a sex party who look for the slightest opportunity to sleep with a girl. I don't really like to see a fictitious Subaru acting in such a perfidious way. He could just give her a talk but no, he abuses her innocence to try to sleep with her and pervert her. When you really love someone, you suppress your own desires to make sure your partner is sure of what she is doing and never regrets her action under the circumstances. First times are precious and unforgettable, you never do it on a whim just to try unless you are an easy person... But I doubt that people have the strength to understand... I'd like to give him a good kneeing between his legs.
A new Emilia doujin ♡( ◡‿◡ ) and she does actually need more love, mhm.
When you need hentai to satisfy the wait for a season 2...
My precious Emilia needs more love <3
holy moly, bust all kinds of nuts
